entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.IFRS.0127.9596] The statement 0007 - Statement - Consolidated Statements of Cash Flows includes the concept ifrs-full:GainLossOnCessationOfConsolidationOfSubsidiariesDueToChangeOfInvestmentEntityStatus in the presentation tree. The filing does not include a dimensional structure for this statement. The filing does not include a default value for this presentation item ifrs-full:GainLossOnCessationOfConsolidationOfSubsidiariesDueToChangeOfInvestmentEntityStatus but does include dimensionalized values for this element of the following:
153,000,000
If the dimensionalized value appears in the financial statements, then a dimension needs to be added to the report. If the item has no value on the financial statements, then the presentation item should be removed from the financial statements.
Total Element : ifrs-full:GainLossOnCessationOfConsolidationOfSubsidiariesDueToChangeOfInvestmentEntityStatus Total period : 2024-01-01 to 2024-12-31 Dimensions : ifrs-full:JointVenturesAxis=ken:QorosMember
Rule Element Id:9596 Rule version: 26.0.9 - https://xbrl.ifrs.org/taxonomy/2024-03-27/full_ifrs/full_ifrs-cor_2024-03-27.xsd 981
